pages.text: Simply shift+right click a bricks block with a respective Crystallized Gem, while in its respective biome to craft a Crystallized Brick Block. This will cost the Crystallized Gem, but net some Mythos.
Shift-Right Click with Crystallized Fire. You must be in a Hell-based biome.
Shift-Right Click with Crystallized Woe. You must be in a Ocean-based biome.
Shift-Right Click with Crystallized Memory. You must be in a Plains-based biome.
Shift-Right Click with Crystallized Grief. You must be in a Taiga-based biome.
Shift-Right Click with Crystallized Oath. You must be in a Desert-based biome.
